frameDefinitions: The Protagonist is in an initial state, before beginning to be involved in the Activity, but all pre-conditions for performance of the Activity have been satisfied.
listRoleDefinitions: This role identifies the <fen>Protagonist</fen> in the initial state of an activity.
The action that the <fen>Protagonist</fen> is prepared to do.
An entity which stands in metonymically for the <fen>Activity</fen>.
The time when the <fen>Protagonist</fen> is ready.
listRoleExamples: The students were finally ready <fex>to take the exam</fex> .

sourceCandidateSpans.text: at least the past ten years
approximately one and a half years ago
Commander of the Faithful Mullah Muhammad Umar
